報告量有點多，但是也能從中探索和練習。
另外希望老師可以在每項任務公布前先設好ddl，以免學生在不定期查看moodle的情況下錯過ddl而逾期繳交作業。
老師備課很認真內容豐富，對求職小白很有幫助，引導我們撰寫履歷練習面試等，如果有課外的事情求助老師也很樂意與幫忙！

William is a very sound professor, well-disciplined and I enjoy the class overall. The schedule is not loose, it is well organized and it effectively pushed me to enhance my time management skills. More to be said, but highly recommended!
William has made great contributions to this class and helped us establish confidence in expressing ourselves in English
唯一選擇威廉！

William always designs a thorough curriculum for students, and provides rich materials. However, if you don't like to put efforts on tasks, you should consider taking it or not. William is the best instructor!
